remarks: ~ cdlemf with additional constraint of non-identity.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2013.)
statement:
cdlemfnid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemfnid.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemfnid.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemfnid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemfnid.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemfnid.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemfnid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) -> E. f e. T ( ( R ` f ) = U /\ f =/= ( _I |` B ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ f $.
$d A f $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d T f $.
$d U f $.
$d W f $.
